string-array.name: protocols_do_not_match
string-array.item: Unfortunately, this application cannot process the history repository protocol.
You may have imported settings from an application with a higher version, where this protocol is supported.
Please check if there is an application update.

resources.string: Hm…\\nThere is no history here…\\nWhere is she?
Would you like to go out?

This application is created entirely by one person. His name is Max Savitsky. All systems, all core, everything is done by this person. He also gave permission to the company SM-app for the publication of this application.
Do you really want to clear the history?
The last result will be saved after closing the application.
The last result will not be saved after closing the application.
Select the location of the button to display the settings, history, etc.
Please select at least one option
Are you sure you want to delete the description for this entry?

We need to get permission to read and write to the device memory. This is necessary so that you can import or export application settings, because the record goes to the repository. Please give us permission.

Average. This is the sum of all numbers divided by their number. You can use it in various combinations of actions. For example, use as a term, a factor, or find a factorial. K o When you pressed the button of this mode, the symbol will appear on the screen and the bracket will open. Here you can add only numbers and the addition sign, and you can also add a number from the story. After closing the brackets, the kernel (the algorithm by which we consider your example) goes into normal mode.
Geometric mean. This is the square root of the product of all numbers. It works like the arithmetic mean. The only difference is that instead of addition signs, only multiplication signs can be used.
What is average and geometric mean and how to use them
Select number systems to convert number
Rate our application and leave a review. So we will understand how much you like our application and in which direction to develop it. Thank!
We would like to tell you about the changes in this version. Perhaps these will be coordinating changes that, for example, change the logic of calculations.
Long press this button and the selected record will be deleted immediately.
To continue, we need to restart the application.
To continue working with this function, the application needs to update the history storage protocol. Click OK to execute.

We have moved the settings, history, generators and converter button to the new side menu. You can open it with a swipe from the left edge of the screen or click on the button from the top left.

Have a nice use!
In the backup file, the data was incorrectly written or manually changed. No settings have been imported.
